channel.title: New and improved website template!
channel.description:
[b]Please NOTE that this is not a server advertisement.[/b]
Ok guys, I've been thinking on how to improve this site template: [url=http://prntscr.com/lg50w]http://prntscr.com/lg50w[/url] and make it much better. An in real life friend told me that it looks like just a wall of text and needed to add pictures and such. So here is the new design that I cam up with: [url=http://prntscr.com/lg53d]http://prntscr.com/lg53d[/url]. On a different thread Ruby told me to make color changes, if you think there needs to be color changes, please give me either the HEX or RGB color code and I'll be glad to try it out!

item.title: New and improved website template!
item.dc:creator: @KempiScape KempiScape
item.description:
@KempiScape wrote:

^ maybe you can make a color picker ?

Read full topic

item.title: New and improved website template!
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

It looks pretty decent, however the black and white as an immediate change doesn’t look right. I like the top half with the blue and the three images displayed there, that part looks good. However, if you have a more gradual change from black to white, I think it’ll look much better, or even have the background one constant color.

Read full topic

item.title: New and improved website template!
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

Ah, I see now. I’d still use some rune-scape items in the template, make it look less serious.

Read full topic

item.title: New and improved website template!
item.dc:creator: @Sibor Sibor
item.description:
@Sibor wrote:

it's a bit better in my opinion, but these kind of websites make me sick now since i see them so often. (the same modern style over and over again) Good job though
Thank-you
You posted here for advice and I gave you what I thought, I don't see why you would put computer monitors on a home page for an RSPS.
They're not computer moditors, here is a picture so far: [url=http://prntscr.com/lhwkg]http://prntscr.com/lhwkg[/url] I showed the computer monitor for the sake of the box-shadow!

Read full topic

item.title: New and improved website template!
item.dc:creator: @Sibor Sibor
item.description:
@Sibor wrote:

Ruby, the owner likes the way the website flows along with the server, just because it’s an RSPS does it mean it has to have swords, armor, etc…

Read full topic

item.title: New and improved website template!
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

That doesn’t do the site any favours for being an RSPS though, I would try and decorate them with things relating to the game, armour, weapons, skilling elements.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

It looks better, try adding some form of decoration around the outside of the video loaders, they look too bland.

item.title: New and improved website template!
item.dc:creator: @Sibor Sibor
item.description:
@Sibor wrote:

Thank-you about the grammar also about the blue, what color should it be then?

Also about the,

we don't want to make game play our perspective
, the owner typed that not me.

Read full topic

item.title: New and improved website template!
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

The blue clashes like mad with the other colours. Feels a bit plain and boring but for non RSPS related things its okay if you remove the blue.

Btw if your using this website for your RSPS, fix your grammar mistakes + the things you wrote are a bit odd. Like “we don’t want to make game play our perspective” makes no sense at all, a lot of it doesn’t. It looks like you want to sound smart and woah but your using the wording wrong so think about what you want to say then try and make it more advanced by adding wording/giving it to a friend to do for you.
Just some advice^

Read full topic
